short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,es_419,et,: Now you can play Subway Surfer Official right on Chrome™ Browser! Offline and Popup Version, without internet required!
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,fr,ru,vi: Now you can play Subway Surfers Official right on Chrome™ Browser! Offline and Popup Version, without internet required!
short.tr: Artık Subway Surfer Resmi versiyonunu doğrudan Chrome™ Tarayıcıda oynayabilirsiniz! İnternetsiz ve açılır pencere versiyonu!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now you can enjoy Subway Surfers Original directly on your Chrome™ browser! Play the Offline and Popup Versions without requiring an internet connection!

If you're a big fan of endless runner games, Subway Surfers is a must-play. Similar to other endless runner games, it involves non-stop running along perilous roads.

Subway Surfers Online, also known as the "non-stop running" game, is adored by many on Fun Game. In this game, you play as a mischievous teenager who is being chased for graffitiing a train. You'll run along the tracks to escape the inspector and his dog. As you run, you must skillfully navigate obstacles and collect coins scattered along the tracks. The game ends if you stumble, get caught by the inspector, or hit an obstacle.
